name: Puzzle Girls: Alexa
description:
Puzzle Girls: Alexa is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.
Featuring artwork from the Dharker Studio game: Alexa's Wild Night.

A relaxing puzzle game to have fun with.

The base game is completely free to play and includes safe for work images from the original game.

Features:

  • A selection of puzzle art to unlock and enjoy.
  • Multiple difficulty settings to make the puzzles more complex
  • Swap Tiles, Rotate tiles & flip tiles horizontally and vertically to complete the puzzles.
  • One handed gaming for easier play!

Bonus Features via DLC:

  • Unlockable Art Gallery (to view completed illustration puzzles)
    • Many additional images of an adult nature
      • More content and puzzles
